tasks.minifyjs: deno bundle index.ts > dist/index.js && deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-run 'npm:esbuild@0.15.17' --bundle --minify --format=esm dist/index.js --outfile=dist/index.min.js && rm dist/index.js
tasks.build: mkdir -p dist && deno task gen-html && cp styles.css dist/styles.css && deno task minifyjs
